name: Let Them Go Dave
description:
You are DAVE, small eldritch child who likes to play with humans.

But your mother found out, and she wants you to let them go home.

Well you have to listen to your mother, but why can't it be made into another game. You've heard minigolf is pretty fun.

Controls: Mouse and left click, R for restart, Esc for menu

Credits:

  • Font - PixelByzantine by Christina Antoinette Neofotistou
  • Music - Fall Away by Kirk Osamayo
  • Special thanks to Stanislav Pomkla (M3CT0S)
